content: *it s easy super warm and with a huge pompom or without you decide surely you ll love it this winter * **one size** to fit head circumference 54-57cm/21 5-23 length approx 22 5cm/9 **yarn** 1 skein of martin s lab big singles - 80% merino 20% nylon 70m/77y per 100g sample shown in colorway prismatic **needles** 8mm/us #11 or size needed for gauge dpns or 40cm/16 circular and needles for small circumference at crown 6 5mm/us #10 5 or 1 5mm smaller than gauge needles dpns or 40cm/16 circular **other notions** stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving pompom maker optional **gauge** 11 5 sts x 16 row over 10cm/4 in stockinette stitch worked in the round with needle 8mm/us #11 *** **polska wersja znajduje się na stronie justyna knits 1 ** 1 https //www justynaknits com/post/calzetta-opis-czapki-na-drutach
